mapper.select: SELECT u.serial AS userSerial, u.id AS id, u.name AS name, u.gender AS gender, u.point AS point, r.serial AS commentSerial, r.content AS content, r.reg_date AS regDate, r.update_date AS updateDate FROM User u JOIN Reply r ON u.serial = r.user_serial WHERE comment_serial = #{commentSerial}

SELECT u.serial AS userSerial, u.id AS id, u.name AS name, u.gender AS gender, u.point AS point, r.serial AS commentSerial, r.content AS content, r.reg_date AS regDate, r.update_date AS updateDate FROM User u JOIN Reply r ON u.serial = r.user_serial WHERE serial = #{replySerial}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Reply (comment_serial, user_serial, content) VALUE (#{commentSerial}, #{userSerial}, #{content})
